entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending after midnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 30 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
